resources.string: "The theremin is an early electronic musical instrument controlled without discernible physical contact from the player. It is named after its Russian inventor, Professor Léon Theremin, who patented the device in 1928." \n\n- from Wikipedia
The Pocket Theremin was created by Carl Thomé as a homework assignment at KTH Royal Institute of Technology.
